meanings.definition: To exert (oneself) too much or too forcefully.
meanings.sent1: After the race, he overexerted himself and felt very tired.
meanings.sent2: She overexerted during the workout and ended up with sore muscles.
meanings.sent3: He overexerted while trying to impress his friends with his strength.
meanings.sent4: The engine overexerted itself trying to climb the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The athlete overexerted, pushing past his limits to reach the finish line.

meanings.definition: To strain or push beyond one's physical limits.
meanings.sent1: The hiker overexerted himself by carrying too heavy a backpack.
meanings.sent2: She overexerted her injured knee by running too far.
meanings.sent3: The toddler overexerted trying to lift the heavy box, causing a funny scene.
meanings.sent4: The old car overexerted up the steep hill, smoke billowing from the engine.
meanings.sent5: The worker overexerted himself, lifting heavy boxes all day, and ended up exhausted.
